blogPost.title: What are the easiest ways to decrease debt? Answer by @TheBudgetnista, Personal Finance Educator and CEO of The Budgetnista. https://t.co/GWRx0W7WHB https://t.co/fXzVNf7pJd
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 借金を減らす最も簡単な方法は何ですか？Answer by @TheBudgetnista, Personal Finance Educator and CEO of The Budgetnista. https://t.co/GWRx0W7WHB https://t.co/fXzVNf7pJd
减少债务的最简单方法是什么？回答者：@TheBudgetnista，个人财务教育家和The Budgetnista的CEO。https://t.co/GWRx0W7WHB https://t.co/fXzVNf7pJd
減少債務的最簡單方法是什麼？回答者：@TheBudgetnista，個人財務教育家和The Budgetnista的CEO。https://t.co/GWRx0W7WHB https://t.co/fXzVNf7pJd

previous.title: How can parents better educate their kids about opioids? Answer by Ben Westhoff, Author of Fentanyl, Inc. https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI

localize.full_text: 親が子供にオピオイドについて上手に教育するには？回答：Ben Westhoff, Author of Fentanyl, Inc. https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI
父母如何更好地对孩子进行阿片类药物的教育？由《芬太尼公司》作者Ben Westhoff回答 https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI
父母如何更好地對孩子進行阿片類藥物的教育？由《芬太尼公司》作者Ben Westhoff回答 https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI

next.title: Why is diversity lacking in the STEM field? Answer by @ainissaramirez, Scientist and the Author of "The Alchemy of Us". https://t.co/bbvdVPKcyZ https://t.co/kzeoylZWa6

localize.full_text: なぜ、STEM分野には多様性がないのか？科学者であり、「The Alchemy of Us」の著者でもある@ainissaramirez氏による回答です。https://t.co/bbvdVPKcyZ https://t.co/kzeoylZWa6
为什么在STEM领域缺乏多样性？回答者：@ainissaramirez，科学家，《我们的炼金术》作者。https://t.co/bbvdVPKcyZ https://t.co/kzeoylZWa6
爲什麼在STEM領域缺乏多樣性？回答者：@ainissaramirez，科學家，《我們的鍊金術》作者。https://t.co/bbvdVPKcyZ https://t.co/kzeoylZWa6
